verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <WH1961> came בְּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> And it came to pass in the month נִיסָ֗ן <WH5212> Nisan שְׁנַ֥ת <WH8141> year עֶשְׂרִ֛ים <WH6242> in the twentieth לְאַרְתַּחְשַׁ֥סְתְּא <WH783> of Artaxerxes הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king יַ֣יִן <WH3196> [that] wine לְפָנָ֑יו <WH6440> [was] before וָאֶשָּׂ֤א <WH5375> him and I took up אֶת־ <WH853> הַיַּ֙יִן֙ <WH3196> the wine וָאֶתְּנָ֣ה <WH5414> and gave לַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> [it] unto the king וְלֹא־ <WH3808> had not הָיִ֥יתִי <WH1961> been רַ֖ע <WH7451> Now I had not been [beforetime] sad לְפָנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> in his presence

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> said לִ֨י הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> Wherefore the king מַדּ֣וּעַ ׀ <WH4069> Why פָּנֶ֣יךָ <WH6440> unto me Why [is] thy countenance רָעִ֗ים <WH7451> sad וְאַתָּה֙ <WH859> you אֵֽינְךָ֣ <WH369> is nothing חוֹלֶ֔ה <WH2470> seeing thou [art] not sick אֵ֣ין <WH369> is nothing זֶ֔ה <WH2088> he כִּי־ <WH3588> for אִ֖ם <WH518> but רֹ֣עַֽ <WH7455> ? this [is] nothing [else] but sorrow לֵ֑ב <WH3820> of heart וָאִירָ֖א <WH3372> afraid הַרְבֵּ֥ה <WH7235> sore מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> Then I was very

וָאֹמַ֣ר <WH559> And said לַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> Let the king לְעוֹלָ֣ם <WH5769> for ever יִחְיֶ֑ה <WH2421> live מַדּ֜וּעַ <WH4069> Why לֹא־ <WH3808> not יֵרְע֣וּ <WH7489> not be sad פָנַ֗י <WH6440> why should not my countenance אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> when הָעִ֜יר <WH5892> when the city בֵּית־ <WH1004> the place קִבְר֤וֹת <WH6913> sepulchres אֲבֹתַי֙ <WH1> of my fathers' חֲרֵבָ֔ה <WH2717> decay וּשְׁעָרֶ֖יהָ <WH8179> and the gates אֻכְּל֥וּ <WH398> thereof are consumed בָאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> burning ס

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לִי֙ הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> Then the king עַל־ <WH5921> unto מַה־ <WH4100> What זֶּ֖ה <WH2088> he אַתָּ֣ה <WH859> you מְבַקֵּ֑שׁ <WH1245> unto me For what dost thou make request וָֽאֶתְפַּלֵּ֔ל <WH6419> ? So I prayed אֶל־ <WH413> to אֱלֹהֵ֖י <WH430> to the God הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <WH8064> of heaven

וָאֹמַ֣ר <WH559> And I said לַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king אִם־ <WH518> If עַל־ <WH5921> and הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king ט֔וֹב <WH2895> If it please וְאִם־ <WH518> and if יִיטַ֥ב <WH3190> have found favour עַבְדְּךָ֖ <WH5650> and if thy servant לְפָנֶ֑יךָ <WH6440> in thy sight אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> you תִּשְׁלָחֵ֣נִי <WH7971> that thou wouldest send אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> me unto Judah אֶל־ <WH413> to עִ֛יר <WH5892> unto the city קִבְר֥וֹת <WH6913> sepulchres אֲבֹתַ֖י <WH1> of my fathers' וְאֶבְנֶֽנָּה׃ <WH1129> that I may build

וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> said לִ֨י הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king וְהַשֵּׁגַ֣ל ׀ <WH7694> unto me (the queen יוֹשֶׁ֣בֶת <WH3427> also sitting אֶצְל֗וֹ <WH681> beside עַד־ <WH5704> against מָתַ֛י <WH4970> How יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become מַֽהֲלָכֲךָ֖ <WH4109> will your journey וּמָתַ֣י <WH4970> be and when תָּשׁ֑וּב <WH7725> be? and when wilt thou return וַיִּיטַ֤ב <WH3190> be accepted לִפְנֵֽי־ <WH6440> accept הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> the king וַיִּשְׁלָחֵ֔נִי <WH7971> to send וָֽאֶתְּנָ֥ה <WH5414> me and I set ל֖וֹ זְמָֽן׃ <WH2165> him a time

וָאוֹמַר֮ <WH559> Moreover I said לַמֶּלֶךְ֒ <WH4428> unto the king אִם־ <WH518> If עַל־ <WH5921> and הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> the king ט֔וֹב <WH2895> If it please אִגְּרוֹת֙ <WH107> let letters יִתְּנוּ־ <WH5414> be given לִ֔י עַֽל־ <WH5921> for פַּחֲו֖וֹת <WH6346> me to the governors עֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> beyond הַנָּהָ֑ר <WH5104> the river אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> they יַעֲבִיר֔וּנִי <WH5674> that they may convey me over עַ֥ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> I אָב֖וֹא <WH935> till I come אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> into Judah

וְאִגֶּ֡רֶת <WH107> And a letter אֶל־ <WH413> to אָסָף֩ <WH623> unto Asaph שֹׁמֵ֨ר <WH8104> the keeper הַפַּרְדֵּ֜ס <WH6508> forest אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king's אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> to which יִתֶּן־ <WH5414> that he may give לִ֣י עֵצִ֡ים <WH6086> me timber לְ֠קָרוֹת <WH7136> to make beams אֶת־ <WH853> שַׁעֲרֵ֨י <WH8179> for the gates הַבִּירָ֤ה <WH1002> of the palace אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which לַבַּ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> which [appertained] to the house וּלְחוֹמַ֣ת <WH2346> and for the wall הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> of the city וְלַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> and for the house אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which אָב֣וֹא <WH935> that I shall enter into אֵלָ֑יו <WH413> about וַיִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> granted לִ֣י הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king כְּיַד־ <WH3027> hand אֱלֹהַ֖י <WH430> of my God הַטּוֹבָ֥ה <WH2896> me according to the good עָלָֽי׃ <WH5921> and

וָֽאָב֗וֹא <WH935> Then I came אֶֽל־ <WH413> to פַּֽחֲווֹת֙ <WH6346> to the governors עֵ֣בֶר <WH5676> beyond הַנָּהָ֔ר <WH5104> the river וָאֶתְּנָ֣ה <WH5414> and gave לָהֶ֔ם אֵ֖ת <WH853> אִגְּר֣וֹת <WH107> letters הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> them the king's וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> had sent עִמִּי֙ <WH5973> with הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> Now the king שָׂ֥רֵי <WH8269> captains חַ֖יִל <WH2428> of the army וּפָרָשִֽׁים׃ <WH6571> and horsemen פ

וַיִּשְׁמַ֞ע <WH8085> heard סַנְבַלַּ֣ט <WH5571> When Sanballat הַחֹרֹנִ֗י <WH2772> the Horonite וְטֽוֹבִיָּה֙ <WH2900> and Tobiah הָעֶ֣בֶד <WH5650> the servant הָֽעַמֹּנִ֔י <WH5984> the Ammonite וַיֵּ֥רַע <WH7489> displeasing לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> like רָעָ֣ה <WH7451> adversity גְדֹלָ֑ה <WH1419> aloud אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after בָּ֥א <WH935> that there was come אָדָ֔ם <WH120> a man לְבַקֵּ֥שׁ <WH1245> to seek טוֹבָ֖ה <WH2896> the welfare לִבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel
וָאָב֖וֹא <WH935> So I came אֶל־ <WH413> to יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> to Jerusalem וָאֱהִי־ <WH1961> become שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> was there יָמִ֥ים <WH3117> days שְׁלֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> and was there three

וָאָק֣וּם ׀ <WH6965> And I arose לַ֗יְלָה <WH3915> in the night אֲנִי֮ <WH589> I וַאֲנָשִׁ֣ים ׀ <WH376> men מְעַט֮ <WH4592> I and some עִמִּי֒ <WH5973> with וְלֹא־ <WH3808> did not הִגַּ֣דְתִּי <WH5046> with me neither told לְאָדָ֔ם <WH120> I [any] man מָ֗ה <WH4100> what אֱלֹהַי֙ <WH430> what my God נֹתֵ֣ן <WH5414> had put אֶל־ <WH413> into לִבִּ֔י <WH3820> in my heart לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <WH6213> to do לִירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> at Jerusalem וּבְהֵמָה֙ <WH929> neither [was there any] beast אֵ֣ין <WH369> and there עִמִּ֔י <WH5973> with כִּ֚י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo הַבְּהֵמָ֔ה <WH929> with me save the beast אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I רֹכֵ֥ב <WH7392> that I rode upon בָּֽהּ׃

וָאֵצְאָ֨ה <WH3318> And I went out בְשַֽׁעַר־ <WH8179> by the gate הַגַּ֜יא <WH1516> of the valley לַ֗יְלָה <WH3915> by night וְאֶל־ <WH413> in פְּנֵי֙ <WH6440> even before עֵ֣ין <WH5869> affliction הַתַּנִּ֔ין <WH8577> the dragon וְאֶל־ <WH413> about שַׁ֖עַר <WH8179> port הָאַשְׁפֹּ֑ת <WH830> and to the dung וָאֱהִ֨י <WH1961> become שֹׂבֵ֜ר <WH7663> inspecting בְּחוֹמֹ֤ת <WH2346> the walls יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> of Jerusalem אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which [הַמְפֹרוָצִים כ] (הֵ֣ם ק) (פְּרוּצִ֔ים <WH6555> abroad ק) וּשְׁעָרֶ֖יהָ <WH8179> and the gates אֻכְּל֥וּ <WH398> thereof were consumed בָאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> with fire

וָאֶֽעֱבֹר֙ <WH5674> Then I went on אֶל־ <WH413> about שַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> to the gate הָעַ֔יִן <WH5869> of the fountain וְאֶל־ <WH413> about בְּרֵכַ֖ת <WH1295> pool הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> and to the king's וְאֵין־ <WH369> there מָק֥וֹם <WH4725> but [there was] no place לַבְּהֵמָ֖ה <WH929> for the beast לַעֲבֹ֥ר <WH5674> [that was] under me to pass תַּחְתָּֽי׃ <WH8478> Thahash

וָאֱהִ֨י <WH1961> become עֹלֶ֤ה <WH5927> Then went I up בַנַּ֙חַל֙ <WH5158> by the brook לַ֔יְלָה <WH3915> in the night וָאֱהִ֥י <WH1961> become שֹׂבֵ֖ר <WH7663> and inspected בַּחוֹמָ֑ה <WH2346> the wall וָאָשׁ֗וּב <WH7725> and turned back וָאָב֛וֹא <WH935> and entered בְּשַׁ֥עַר <WH8179> by the gate הַגַּ֖יְא <WH1516> of the valley וָאָשֽׁוּב׃ <WH7725> and [so] returned

וְהַסְּגָנִ֗ים <WH5461> And the rulers לֹ֤א <WH3808> nor יָדְעוּ֙ <WH3045> knew אָ֣נָה <WH575> where הָלַ֔כְתִּי <WH1980> not whither I went וּמָ֖ה <WH4100> what אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I עֹשֶׂ֑ה <WH6213> or what I did וְלַיְּהוּדִ֨ים <WH3064> [it] to the Jews וְלַכֹּהֲנִ֜ים <WH3548> nor to the priests וְלַחֹרִ֣ים <WH2715> nor to the nobles וְלַסְּגָנִ֗ים <WH5461> nor to the rulers וּלְיֶ֙תֶר֙ <WH3499> nor to the rest עֹשֵׂ֣ה <WH6213> that did הַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <WH4399> the work עַד־ <WH5704> as כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> neither had I as yet לֹ֥א <WH3808> nor הִגַּֽדְתִּי׃ <WH5046> told

וָאוֹמַ֣ר <WH559> Then said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <WH413> about אַתֶּ֤ם <WH859> You רֹאִים֙ <WH7200> I unto them Ye see הָרָעָה֙ <WH7451> the distress אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after אֲנַ֣חְנוּ <WH587> ourselves בָ֔הּ אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> after יְרוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> that we [are] in how Jerusalem חֲרֵבָ֔ה <WH2717> decay וּשְׁעָרֶ֖יהָ <WH8179> and the gates נִצְּת֣וּ <WH3341> thereof are burned בָאֵ֑שׁ <WH784> with fire לְכ֗וּ <WH1980> Come וְנִבְנֶה֙ <WH1129> and let us build up אֶת־ <WH853> חוֹמַ֣ת <WH2346> the wall יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem וְלֹא־ <WH3808> so נִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become ע֖וֹד <WH5750> longer חֶרְפָּֽה׃ <WH2781> that we be no more a reproach

וָאַגִּ֨יד <WH5046> Then I told לָהֶ֜ם אֶת־ <WH853> יַ֣ד <WH3027> them of the hand אֱלֹהַ֗י <WH430> of my God אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> how הִיא֙ <WH1931> he טוֹבָ֣ה <WH2896> which was good עָלַ֔י <WH5921> unto וְאַף־ <WH637> and also דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> words הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> upon me as also the king's אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which אָֽמַר־ <WH559> that he had spoken לִ֑י וַיֹּֽאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> unto me And they said נָק֣וּם <WH6965> Let us rise up וּבָנִ֔ינוּ <WH1129> and build וַיְחַזְּק֥וּ <WH2388> So they strengthened יְדֵיהֶ֖ם <WH3027> their hands לַטּוֹבָֽה׃ <WH2896> for [this] good פ

וַיִּשְׁמַע֩ <WH8085> heard סַנְבַלַּ֨ט <WH5571> But when Sanballat הַחֹרֹנִ֜י <WH2772> the Horonite וְטֹבִיָּ֣ה ׀ <WH2900> and Tobiah הָעֶ֣בֶד <WH5650> the servant הָֽעַמּוֹנִ֗י <WH5984> the Ammonite וְגֶ֙שֶׁם֙ <WH1654> and Geshem הָֽעַרְבִ֔י <WH6163> the Arabian וַיַּלְעִ֣גוּ <WH3932> [it] they laughed us to scorn לָ֔נוּ וַיִּבְז֖וּ <WH959> and despised עָלֵ֑ינוּ <WH5921> against וַיֹּאמְר֗וּ <WH559> us and said מָֽה־ <WH4100> What הַדָּבָ֤ר <WH1697> What [is] this thing הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> is this אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> ye עֹשִׂ֔ים <WH6213> that ye do הַעַ֥ל <WH5921> against הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> king אַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> will ye מֹרְדִֽים׃ <WH4775> ? will ye rebel

וָאָשִׁ֨יב <WH7725> answered אוֹתָ֜ם <WH853> דָּבָ֗ר <WH1697> act וָאוֹמַ֤ר <WH559> I them and said לָהֶם֙ אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> unto them The God הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of heaven ה֚וּא <WH1931> he יַצְלִ֣יחַֽ <WH6743> he will prosper לָ֔נוּ וַאֲנַ֥חְנוּ <WH587> we עֲבָדָ֖יו <WH5650> us therefore we his servants נָק֣וּם <WH6965> will arise וּבָנִ֑ינוּ <WH1129> and build וְלָכֶ֗ם אֵֽין־ <WH369> have חֵ֧לֶק <WH2506> but ye have no portion וּצְדָקָ֛ה <WH6666> nor right וְזִכָּר֖וֹן <WH2146> nor memorial בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> in Jerusalem
